text:
hey guys today I am at my family's go-to seafood 
restaurant it's called laem charoch seafood and

it's close to where we live and they specialize 
in just seafood so they do a really good job and

today there's not a whole lot of people because 
it's just after New Year so restaurants are dying

down which is the perfect time to come because 
this place can get really really packed so and

if you come to Thailand by the way you have to 
visit one of these sort of seafood specialty

places because we have a lot of great seafood 
and trust me Thai people know what to do with

seafood so let's go and take a look at what we've 
got today so the first item to arrive on the

table is barbecued squid and this is a special 
squid in that it also has with it so this is

highly desirable trade so that clear thing in the 
middle that's big and then of course it is served

nothing seafood or seafood dipping sauce this 
is called co-op Winson now I have a recipe for

a similar thing but it uses shrimp but this one 
uses crabmeat so it's a little more expensive

a little fancier you can see all these lumps of 
crabmeat this dish is what this restaurant is sort

of famous for it's something called black Capone 
Tottenham black and it's a barramundi fish and

they split it up and deep-fried the whole thing 
and they pour over at a fish sauce sauce so Pizza

is a soft like a sweet and salty and it's super 
famous nowadays in any seafood restaurant this

is shrimp with a spicy sweet and sour garlicky 
sauce it looks really good I tasted the sausage

now and it's actually a really yummy and when you 
eat shrimp with head on you got to get inside the

shrimp head and look at all that fatty meat that 
is the best part and for drinks we have watermelon

juice scoop I don't you can call smoothing it's 
basically just watermelon some syrup nice blended

very classic drink of Thailand and the star of the 
show simple steamed crab now as you notice this is

also crap with eggs so those orange things that 
look like take yoga that's crap and just simply

see that my people like the aircraft so this 
is clock home minima now our fish steamed with

lime juice and it's a recipe that I actually 
make at home and I have a recipe for it but

actually ordered this one because I wanted to see 
how I'd stand up to the professional kitchen so a

lot of times it'll come on fire like this which I 
don't actually like because it's good the Humber

cookbook fish and I'm going to tell you a little 
secret the best part of the barramundi is the

cheeks if there's only a little bit of it but it's 
the most tender piece of meat in the entire fish
and I took it

that's pretty good so I'm going to 
try the squid egg for you what I

love about barbecued squid especially in 
Thailand is you can taste the grill you

can taste a charcoal the eggs if you've 
never had squid it it's soft and creamy

it's a little bit gelatinous the really 
interesting texture you have to try it
